review: Not good for me. Still felt like rubbish, had an attempt then they switched me off, panic attacks, anxiety, all of that. Try it though it might work for you. It just didnâ€™t for me

Its my 3rd day and  I feel calmer.. my mind is at ease..not over thinking and it makes me sleepy most of the time.. so now I'm trying to drink strong coffee with it and it wakes me up . With calmer thinking. But I would wished it doesn't make me sleepy, due to driving a lot for a living and so kinda hard but it works . I have 10mg  I been having anxiety and depression

I went through a litany of cocktails like just about everyone to try and help my persistent depressive disorder. Fluoxetine  has worked the best so far in almost 20 years. But I am medication resistant so going on 5 years off and on. Weight loss was a good side effect.
This medication is a God send. If I didn't get put on this my life would still be upside down. It makes you sleepy a lot of the time.
